books.description: A killer for hire who only takes out bad guys seeks redemption as he does one final job. Read by Paul Sparks. 16 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BILLY SUMMERS

books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer. Read by Alma Cuervo, Julia Whelan and Robin Miles. 12 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities. Read by Carey Mulligan. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana. Read by the author. 10 hours, 35 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Adam Schiff
books.description: The congressman from California describes risks to our democracy and the resurgence of autocracy. Read by the author. 17 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MIDNIGHT IN WASHINGTON

books.author: Bob Woodward and Robert Costa
books.contributor: by Bob Woodward and Robert Costa
books.description: The Washington Post journalists detail the dangers and challenges during the transition to the Biden presidency. Read by Robert Petkoff. 13 hours, 35 minutes unabridged.
books.title: PERIL

books.author: Katie Couric
books.description: The former anchor of the “CBS Evening News” and “Today” describes some of the personal and professional challenges she faced. Read by the author. 15 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GOING THERE

books.author: David Sedaris
books.description: Public and private moments chronicled from the humorist’s 2003-20 diaries. Read by Tracey Ullman and the author. 17 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A CARNIVAL OF SNACKERY

books.author: Anderson Cooper and Katherine Howe
books.contributor: by Anderson Cooper and Katherine Howe
books.description: The CNN host and descendent of the Vanderbilt family charts the rise and fall of this American dynasty. Read by Anderson Cooper. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: VANDERBILT

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Stephanie Grisham
books.description: The former White House press secretary and communications director recounts her time in the Trump inner circle. Read by the author. 9 hours, 58 minutes unabridged.
books.title: I'LL TAKE YOUR QUESTIONS NOW

books.author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.contributor: by Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?

books.author: Ron Howard and Clint Howard
books.contributor: by Ron Howard and Clint Howard
books.description: The Howard brothers credit their success in Hollywood to their Midwestern parents, Rance and Jean. Read by Bryce Dallas Howard and the authors. 13 hours, 18 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BOYS

books.author: Fiona Hill
books.description: The foreign policy expert traces her life from being a coal miner’s daughter in northern England to her testimony in the first impeachment inquiry of former President Trump. Read by the author. 15 hours, 35 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THERE IS NOTHING FOR YOU HERE

books.author: Stanley Tucci
books.description: The award-winning actor reflects on his career, Italian-American heritage, meals and mishaps. Read by the author. 6 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TASTE

books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.” Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
